messages.message: Hi team, for my sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/sayanbhattacharjee1?cw=dev), when I run `cs restart` on the `release-24.07.0-enterprise` branch `vs code`restarts. I'm wondering why this is and how I can fix it? I can't seem to find the logs endpoint on the dev server ui

```(3.9.17) owner@dev:~/instabase$ cs logs -f api-server
Fatal: failed to find any matched log source.```

The `ibdev-backend` template was created after the 24.07 enterprise branch so itâ€™s possible the branch is missing some crafting specific code/config.

There used to be an `*-ent` template for enterprise development. I wonder what happened to that.

You might need to copy some config over to the old branch to spin up IB. cc @mfichman
ibdev-backend isn't compatible w/ 24.07. It's not impossible to make it work, but would require quite a few backports.
@Balaram for vuln fixes, I think we'll need to rely on CI and <#CCY413CSU|> <#C029Z1XRKGR|> <#C02ACPHNMSQ|>
You can also a) use your laptop and `ppy` or b) use the `ibdev`  template + `ppy` to start up services the old-fashioned way.
If there is enough demand, we should consider porting `ibdev-backend` to 24.07 -- cc @Ashish
for ib vulnerabilities, do we need to use --as-docker to build or can we just build as `ppy restart lite --as-aihub`
Either will work. If you don't use `--as-docker`, then there is a setup script to run to install all the required python dependencies -- I think it's in `devtools` somewhere.
